mapper.insert: insert into operation_log(user_id, user_name, operation_type, operation_desc, resource_type, resource_id, request_method, request_uri, ip_address, user_agent, result_status, error_message) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{operationType}, #{operationDesc}, #{resourceType}, #{resourceId}, #{requestMethod}, #{requestUri}, #{ipAddress}, #{userAgent}, #{resultStatus}, #{errorMessage})
